wf_workflow_version.name: Nutanix - Handle Perform Actions
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value: Your recent action request ${actionsysid} on ${application} is Approved.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = ''+workflow.scratchpad.userID;
Your recent action request ${actionsysid} on ${application} is Approved.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = ''+workflow.scratchpad.userID;
Your recent action request ${actionsysid} on ${application} is ${approval_status}.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = ''+workflow.scratchpad.userID;
Your recent action request ${actionsysid} on ${application} is ${approval_status}.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to. answer = ''+workflow.scratchpad.userID;
approval_status=approved^ORapproval_status=rejected^ORapproval_status=cancel^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
approval_status=approved^ORapproval_status=rejected^ORapproval_status=cancel^EQ
// Set the variable 'answer' to true or false to indicate if the condition has been met or not. answer = true;
approval_status=approved^EQ
approval_status=approved^EQ

wf_activity.name: Check requirement of Actions Approval Workflow

Check requirement of Actions Approval Workflow

sys_variable_value.value: workflow.scratchpad.userID = gs.getUserID()+'';
